card.name: Haven Raptor
card.text: Tough - Whenever Haven Raptor is dealt damage, draw a card.

card.name: Tiehana, Voice of Thunder
card.text: Tiehana, Voice of Thunder's power and toughness are equal to the number of cards in your hand. You have no maximum hand size. When Tiehana enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control.

card.name: Ogre Hand Ravager
card.text: When Ogre Hand Ravager enters the battlefield, each player loses a third of his or her life, rounded up.

card.name: Bishop of Rebirth
card.text: Whenever Bishop of Rebirth attacks, you may return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Ashes of the Abhorrent
card.text: Players can't cast spells from graveyards or active abilities of cards in graveyards. Whenever a creature dies, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Deeproot Champion
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Deeproot Champion.

card.name: Dreamcaller Siren
card.text: Flash Flying Dreamcaller Siren can only block creatures with flying. When Dreamcaller Siren enters the battlefield, if you control another Pirate, tap up to two target nonland permanents.

card.name: Goring Ceratops
card.text: Double strike Whenever Goring Ceratops attacks, other creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Hostage Taker
card.text: When Hostage Taker enters the battlefield, exile target artifact or creature until Hostage Taker leaves the battlefield. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

card.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Bloodstained Paladin

card.text: As Arcane Adaptation enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

card.name: Khenra Eternal
card.text: Afflict 1 Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 1 life.)

card.name: Chandra's Defeat
card.text: Chandra’s Defeat deals 5 damage to target red creature or red planeswalker. If that permanent is a Chandra planeswalker, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Liliana's Defeat
card.text: Destroy target black creature or black planeswalker. If that permanent was a Liliana planeswalker, her controller loses 3 life.

card.name: Gideon's Defeat
card.text: Exile target white creature that's attacking or blocking. If it was a Gideon planeswalker, you gain 5 life.

card.name: Nissa's Defeat
card.text: Destroy target Forest, green enchantment, or green planeswalker. If that permanent was a Nissa planeswalker, draw a card.

card.name: Jace's Defeat
card.text: Counter target blue spell. If it was a Jace planeswalker spell, scry 2.

card.name: Wildfire Eternal
card.text: Afflict 4 Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 4 life.) Whenever Wildfire Eternal attacks and isn't blocked, you may cast an instant or sorcery card from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Adorned Pouncer
card.text: Double strike Eternalize {3}{W}{W} {3}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's 4/4 black Zombie Cat with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Abrade
card.text:
Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Ramunap Excavator
card.text: You may play land cards from your graveyard.

card.name: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh
card.text: +2: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of his or her library until he or she exiles a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. +1: Each opponent exiles two cards from his or her hand. -4: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh deals 7 damage to target opponent or creature an opponent controls. -12: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.

card.name: Samut, the Tested
card.text: +1: Up to one target creature gains double strike until end of turn. -2: Samut, the Tested deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players. -7: Search your library for up to two creature and/or planeswalker cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Bontu's Last Reckoning
card.text: Destroy all creatures. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: The Scarab God
card.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses X life and you scry X, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
{2UB}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.
When The Scarab God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next upkeep.

card.name: The Locust God
card.text: Flying Whenever you draw a card, create a 1/1 blue and red Insect creature token with flying and haste. {2}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card. When The Locust God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Thoughtseize
card.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Armageddon
card.text: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Threads of Disloyalty
card.text: Enchant creature with converted mana cost 2 or less You control enchanted creature.

card.name: Omniscience
card.text: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Doomsday
card.text: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

card.name: Boil
card.text: Destroy all Islands.

card.name: Through the Breach
card.text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step. Splice onto Arcane {2}{R}{R} As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Sunder
card.text: Return all lands to their owners' hands.

card.name: Diabolic Edict
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: The Scorpion God
card.text:
Whenever a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, draw a card.
{1br}: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.
When The Scorpion God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Forbid
card.text: Buyback—Discard two cards. You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Counter target spell.

card.name: Slaughter Pact
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{B}. If you don't, you lose the game.

card.name: Choke
card.text: Islands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Avatar of Woe
card.text: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, Avatar of Woe costs {6} less to cast. Fear This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Shatterstorm
card.text: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Lord of Extinction
card.text: Lord of Extinction's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Opposition
card.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: No Mercy
card.text: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.

card.name: Capsize
card.text: Buyback {3} You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Desolation Angel
card.text: Kicker {W}{W} You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Desolation Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all lands you control. If it was kicked, destroy all lands instead.

card.name: Blood Moon
card.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

card.name: Damnation
card.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
